page.title: 04A weeks news (cont)
page.content: {SATURDAY }Local people are being encouraged to go to the Lickey's.The Birmingham leasure chiefs have been encouraging people to go to the country.A map is being published for the new nature trails. {SUNDAY }Bromsgrove Rovers have done it again.They beat Gloucster City 2-0. They are now top of the Southern League Midland Division. He's a champion.Bromsgroves Trevor Lawon wins a trophy for rally driving. He has had a good season so far. Two people from Bromsgrove Rangers were blown off Snowdonia whilst rock climbing.One of the men is in intensive care with spinel injuries and the other is in a stable condition.
